INSERT INTO customer(customer_id, customer_sn, name, business, region, type, phone, level, importance, status, address, owner, remark) VALUES (#{customerId}, #{customerSn}, #{name}, #{business}, #{region}, #{type}, #{phone}, #{level}, #{importance}, #{status}, #{address}, #{owner}, #{remark})
